description: The Deputy Attorney General will brief the Senate on FBI Director James Comey's firing on Thursday
title: Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein Will Brief Senators on James Comey's Firing

description: Donald Trump asked James Comey, the former FBI director, to end an investigation into Michael Flynn's links to Russia, it was reported on Tuesday night.
title: Donald Trump 'asked James Comey to shut FBI investigation into Michael Flynn'

author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
description: Few reporters know deposed FBI Director James Comey as well -- or have been covering him as long -- as CNN's Eric Lichtblau.
title: Why James Comey's congressional testimony will be 'one for the history books'

author: Sky Palma
description: The Senate Intelligence Committee sent a request to former FBI Director James Comey to testify in public regarding the probe into the White House's alleged ties to foreign governments.
title: Senate Intel Committee accepts James Comey’s offer to testify in public

author: Charlie Spiering
description: Former FBI Director James Comey associates are leaking more information about his conversations with President Donald Trump
title: More Leaks: James Comey Memo Says Trump Tried To Shut Down Flynn Investigation - Breitbart

author: Maxwell Tani
description: President Donald Trump suggested that former FBI Director James Comey should prosecute reporters for reporting on leaks of classified information.
title: Trump reportedly told James Comey to consider jailing reporters for publishing classified information

author: Emily Shugerman
description: Donald Trump has said he fired James Comey as FBI Director because he was '"unpopular", during a press conference with the Colombian president.  "Director Comey was very unpopular with most people," Mr Trump claimed, adding that he thought his firing would be a "bipartisan decision".  "Look at all the people on the Democratic side, not only the Republican side, who were saying such terrible things about Director Comey," he said.
title: Donald Trump says he fired James Comey because he was 'unpopular'

author: Clark Mindock
description: Donald Trump asked former FBI Director James Comey to end an investigation into former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn during an Oval Office visit in February, the New York Times has reported. "I hope you can see your way clear to letting this go, to letting Flynn go," the President said to Mr Comey during that meeting, according to the memo. "He is a good guy. I hope you can let this go."
title: Trump 'asked James Comey to shut down Michael Flynn investigation'

author: Allan Smith
description: We now know a lot more on how Americans feel about Trump's firing of FBI Director James Comey thanks to a Tuesday poll from left-leaning Public Policy Polling.
title: We now know a lot more on how Americans feel about Trump's controversial James Comey firing

author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
description: The reporting coming out of The New York Times and CNN is explosive: Deposed FBI Director James Comey wrote a memo following a February 14 meeting with Donald Trump in which he says the President told him "I hope you can let this go" in regard to fired aide Michael Flynn's role in the ongoing investigation into Russia's efforts to influence the 2016 campaign.
title: The James Comey memo is an existential threat to Donald Trump's presidency
